name.baseName: 装煤地面站|焦炭|炼焦煤|热回收|所有规模

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该工业过程数据集对应于用于炼焦煤的装煤地面站。所产生的焦炭通常在钢铁生产中用作燃料和还原剂。热回收方面表明该过程旨在捕获废热，可以被重新使用，从而提高能效。该数据集包含了所有规模的过程，表明它适用于从小型到大型工业设施的不同规模的操作。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码25,四级代码2521文件，在完整版文件中第2881页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为99，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设备耗电量（千瓦时）/（除尘设备额定功率（千瓦）×除尘设备运行时间（小时））。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisDirect discharge，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = annual power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh) / (total rated power (kW) × annual operating time (hours))
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是直排，其效率为0，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为-。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isDirect discharge，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是直排，其效率为0，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为-。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物
源文件中描述为为焦炭，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量
the treatment technology for the pollution of Exhaust gasdidn't offered
污染物指标工业废气量的末端治理技术是-，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为-。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为工业废气量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量
